subject: Re: [cc-community] Creative License Conference
body:
On Sat, 2007-06-09 at 16:55 +0200, Burobjorn wrote:
> Man, what a load of crap.
> 
> How do these PR/marketeer people come up with these texts!?
> 
> grtz
> BjornW

At the same time, you know there will be tons of people at that
conference. I do like the abstraction upon tasks people might be
interested in.

I would also bet that 99% of the people at this conference have never
heard of Creative Commons licensing, which makes me wonder how to get
them on-board.

Jon

> 
> drew Roberts wrote:
